HTTP Routing Table

/ | /(object url) | /buckets | /permissions
 
/
GET /
 
/(object url)
GET /(object url)
PUT /(object url)
PATCH /(object url)
 
/buckets

GET /buckets/(bucket_id)
GET /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections
GET /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections/(collection_id)
GET /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections/(collection_id)/records
GET /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections/(collection_id)/records/(record_id)
GET /buckets/(bucket_id)/groups
GET /buckets/(bucket_id)/groups/(group_id)
GET /buckets/(bucket_id)/history
GET /buckets/default

POST /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections
POST /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections/(collection_id)/records
POST /buckets/(bucket_id)/groups

PUT /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections/(collection_id)
PUT /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections/(collection_id)/records/(record_id)
PUT /buckets/(bucket_id)/groups/(group_id)
DELETE /buckets
DELETE /buckets/(bucket_id)
DELETE /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections
DELETE /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections/(collection_id)
DELETE /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections/(collection_id)/records
DELETE /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections/(collection_id)/records/(record_id)
DELETE /buckets/(bucket_id)/groups/(group_id)

PATCH /buckets/(bucket_id)/collections/(collection_id)
